subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who could have tried to sign Carl Crawford instead of pursuing Cliff Lee, met with the outfielder only 24 hours before he signed with Boston, perhaps to drive up the price for a rival.
snippet: The Yankees, who could have tried to sign Carl Crawford instead of pursuing Cliff Lee, met with the outfielder only 24 hours before he signed with Boston, perhaps to drive up the price for a rival.
